title: Channel Islands National Park: Freedom Of Information Act
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Freedom Of Information Act              Freedom Of Information Act         Â    The Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) gives you the right to access any Department of the Interior (DOI) records unless the information in those records is protected by one or more of the nine exemptions (reasons an agency may withhold records from a requester) and there is a sound legal basis to withhold them. To access records from Channel Islands National Park please contact: Superintendent Channel Islands National Park 1901 Spinnaker Drive Ventura, CA 93001 (805) 658-5714 For more information on how to file a FOIA request, please visit the Department of Interior's Freedom of Information Act Program.
